name: Sith Fury
Lore: 'At his peak, no one could stand up to the Dark Lord of the Sith. His superior tactics devastated those who opposed him.',
Text: 'USED: During a battle, lose one of your lightsabers in that battle to cause all non-unique aliens present to be lost.LOST: If a duel was just initiated, draw 2 destiny. Opponent draws 3 destiny. If the player with the lower total loses the duel, that player loses 6 Force.',
